text: Following World War III, all the nations of the world agreed to 50 years of strict isolation from one another in order to prevent additional conflicts. 50 years later, the United States comes out of exile, only to learn that no one else went into isolation.

Following World War III, all the nations of the world agreed to 50 years of strict isolation from one another in order to prevent additional conflicts. 50 years later, the United States comes out of exile, only to learn that no one else went into isolation. Since the U.S. already had a large underground infrastructure, it was much quicker and easier for them to go underground into isolation then the rest of the world.  As the rest of the world struggled to go into isolation, circumstances beyond most countries control were keeping them at war with each other. The main governments originally settled on a cease fire but that did not last because of certain factions that would not comply. They would attack other nations only to see them respond in kind. This eventually destroyed the rest of the world and everyone above ground. 
After complete radio silence for several months the U.S. decided to send a team up above to check on the situation. The rose up to a world that was rubble, ash and bones. No wild life and especially no people were living on the surface.

After complete radio silence for several months the U.S. decided to send a team up above to check on the situation. The rose up to a world that was rubble, ash and bones. No wild life and especially no people were living on the surface. The team went back down and reported what they saw.

No wild life and especially no people were living on the surface. The team went back down and reported what they saw. Satellites had confirmed this was world wide and they were now the only humans left. It was now time to completely rebuild the world in the image of the United States.

The United States is a very diverse country and has a wide variety of people.

Following World War III, all the nations of the world agreed to 50 years of strict isolation from one another in order to prevent additional conflicts. 50 years later, the United States comes out of exile, only to learn that no one else went into isolation. Since the U.S. already had a large underground infrastructure, it was much quicker and easier for them to go underground into isolation then the rest of the world.  As the rest of the world struggled to go into isolation, circumstances beyond most countries control were keeping them at war with each other. The main governments originally settled on a cease fire but that did not last because of certain factions that would not comply. They would attack other nations only to see them respond in kind. This eventually destroyed the rest of the world and everyone above ground. 
After complete radio silence for several months the U.S. decided to send a team up above to check on the situation. The rose up to a world that was rubble, ash and bones. No wild life and especially no people were living on the surface. The team went back down and reported what they saw. Satellites had confirmed this was world wide and they were now the only humans left. It was now time to completely rebuild the world in the image of the United States. There was one major problem, there was no consensus on what the United States truly stood for. There were too many personal truths and not enough objective truths. This tore the society apart as they tried to rebuild, ultimately leading to civil war and then nuclear war. The rest of the human race was wiped out because they could not agree on simple objective truths.
